 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new transformation stack, initialized to the identity transform.
 19  *
 20  * @class A 3D transformation stack.
 21  */
 22 bigshot.TransformStack = function () {
 23     /**
 24      * The current transform matrix.
 25      *
 26      * @type Matrix
 27      */
 28     this.mvMatrix = null;
 29     
 30     /**
 31      * The object-to-world transform matrix stack.
 32      *
 33      * @type Matrix[]
 34      */
 35     this.mvMatrixStack = [];
 36     
 37     this.reset ();
 38 }
 39 
 40 bigshot.TransformStack.prototype = {
 41     /**
 42      * Pushes the current world transform onto the stack
 43      * and returns a new, identical one.
 44      *
 45      * @return the new world transform matrix
 46      * @param {Matrix} [matrix] the new world transform. 
 47      * If omitted, the current is used
 48      * @type Matrix
 49      */
 50     push : function (matrix) {
 51         if (matrix) {
 52             this.mvMatrixStack.push (matrix.dup());
 53             this.mvMatrix = matrix.dup();
 54             return mvMatrix;
 55         } else {
 56             this.mvMatrixStack.push (this.mvMatrix.dup());
 57             return mvMatrix;
 58         }
 59     },
 60     
 61     /**
 62      * Pops the last-pushed world transform off the stack, thereby restoring it.
 63      *
 64      * @type Matrix
 65      * @return the previously-pushed matrix
 66      */
 67     pop : function () {
 68         if (this.mvMatrixStack.length == 0) {
 69             throw new Error ("Invalid popMatrix!");
 70         }
 71         this.mvMatrix = this.mvMatrixStack.pop();
 72         return mvMatrix;
 73     },
 74     
 75     /**
 76      * Resets the world transform to the identity transform.
 77      */
 78     reset : function () {
 79         this.mvMatrix = Matrix.I(4);
 80     },
 81     
 82     /**
 83      * Multiplies the current world transform with a matrix.
 84      *
 85      * @param {Matrix} matrix the matrix to multiply with
 86      */
 87     multiply : function (matrix) {
 88         this.mvMatrix = matrix.x (this.mvMatrix);
 89     },
 90     
 91     /**
 92      * Adds a translation to the world transform matrix.
 93      *
 94      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} vector the translation vector
 95      */
 96     translate : function (vector) {
 97         var m = Matrix.Translation($V([vector.x, vector.y, vector.z])).ensure4x4 ();
 98         this.multiply (m);
 99     },
100     
101     /**
102      * Adds a rotation to the world transform matrix.
103      *
104      * @param {number} ang the angle in degrees to rotate
105      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} vector the rotation vector
106      */
107     rotate : function (ang, vector) {
108         var arad = ang * Math.PI / 180.0;
109         var m = Matrix.Rotation(arad, $V([vector.x, vector.y, vector.z])).ensure4x4 ();
110         this.multiply (m);
111     },
112     
113     /**
114      * Adds a rotation around the x-axis to the world transform matrix.
115      *
116      * @param {number} ang the angle in degrees to rotate
117      */
118     rotateX : function (ang) {
119         this.rotate (ang, { x : 1, y : 0, z : 0 });
120     },
121     
122     /**
123      * Adds a rotation around the y-axis to the world transform matrix.
124      *
125      * @param {number} ang the angle in degrees to rotate
126      */
127     rotateY : function (ang) {
128         this.rotate (ang, { x : 0, y : 1, z : 0 });
129     },
130     
131     /**
132      * Adds a rotation around the z-axis to the world transform matrix.
133      *
134      * @param {number} ang the angle in degrees to rotate
135      */
136     rotateZ : function (ang) {
137         this.rotate (ang, { x : 0, y : 0, z : 1 });
138     },
139     
140     /**
141      * Multiplies the current matrix with a 
142      * perspective transformation matrix.
143      *
144      * @param {number} fovy vertical field of view
145      * @param {number} aspect viewport aspect ratio
146      * @param {number} znear near image plane
147      * @param {number} zfar far image plane
148      */
149     perspective : function (fovy, aspect, znear, zfar) {
150         var m = makePerspective (fovy, aspect, znear, zfar);
151         this.multiply (m);
152     },
153     
154     matrix : function () {
155         return this.mvMatrix;
156     }
157 }
158
